nodes.text: The Corg system was a Wild Space star system that contained at least two asteroid fields. Although the asteroids were considered to be perilous, they were explored and charted by the Morellian scout Barosa Warren and Casti Tholon, his Human student at the Galactic Outdoor Survival School, by 2 ABY.

The Corg system was first mentioned in Alliance Intelligence Reports, a 1995 sourcebook for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. The 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas placed it within grid square O-20.
